review_title: An exceptional opportunity, amazing students and great potential, but poorly managed in a broken system
job_title: Food Service Management in Ann Arbor, MI
pros: Small organization, good pay, room to grow if you start in a low level position in the kitchen, lots of new people to meet, lots of learning opportunities, lots of great food, people are nice, easy place to learn to cook with the chefs/cooks and you can take those skills with you.
cons: very little time for training new staff with a high turnover, no benefits unless full time and there's only a couple full timers, very little feedback from upper management, no bonuses or staff parties, no staff meetings or communication, no hr personnel
